type LoginView = class inherit Control interface INamingContainer

summary.span: 依据给定用户的身份验证状态和角色成员资格为该用户显示相应的内容模板。

span.span: Displays the appropriate content template for a given user, based on the user's authentication status and role membership.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件根据用户是否已经过身份验证，为不同的用户显示不同的网站内容模板 (或 "视图" ) ，如果是，则显示其所属的网站角色。The control displays different Web site content templates (or "views") for different users, based on whether the user is authenticated and, if so, which Web site roles he or she belongs to. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 中提供的登录控件集，请参阅 [ASP.NET Login Controls 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178329(v=vs.100)) ，然后继续。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178329(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅 [使用成员身份管理用户](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100))。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100)). 存储在属性中的模板 会显示给尚未登录到网站的任何访问者。The template stored in the property is displayed to any visitor to the Web site who has not logged in. 用户登录后，该站点将显示与属性中的某个用户角色关联的模板 或属性中指定的默认模板 。Once a user is logged in, the site displays either a template associated with one of the user's roles in the property or the default template specified in the property. 将模板分配给类的三个模板属性中的任意一个后，控件将管理各种模板之间的切换 ：The control manages switching among the various templates once you assign templates to any of the three template properties of the class: - -指定为未登录到网站的用户显示的模板。 - Specifies the template to display to users who are not logged in to the Web site. 登录的用户将看不到此模板。Users who are logged in will never see this template. - -指定要向登录到网站但不属于具有定义的模板的任何角色组的用户显示的默认模板。 - Specifies the default template to display to users who are logged in to the Web site but do not belong to any role groups with defined templates. - -指定要显示给作为角色成员并且已定义角色组模板的已登录用户的模板。 - Specifies the template to display to logged-in users who are members of roles with defined role-group templates. 内容模板与实例中的特定角色集相关联 。Content templates are associated with particular sets of roles in instances. 按角色组模板在源中的定义顺序进行搜索。Role-group templates are searched in the order they are defined in the source. 将向用户显示第一个匹配的角色组模板。The first matching role-group template is displayed to the user. 如果用户是多个角色的成员，则将使用与用户角色匹配的第一个角色组模板。If a user is a member of more than one role, the first role-group template that matches any of the user's roles is used. 如果有多个模板与单个角色关联，则只使用第一个已定义的模板。If more than one template is associated with a single role, only the first defined template is used. 下表描述了 使用模板的各种组合时控件的行为。The following table describes the behavior of the control when various combinations of templates are used. |LoggedIn 模板属性LoggedIn Template Property|匿名模板属性Anonymous Template Property|RoleGroups 属性RoleGroups Property|登录视图行为LoginView behavior| |--------------------------------|---------------------------------|-------------------------|------------------------| |未设置Not set|未设置Not set|未设置Not set|不显示任何内容。Displays no content.| |设置Set|未设置Not set|未设置Not set|仅当用户登录时显示内容。Displays content only when the user is logged in.| |未设置Not set|设置Set|未设置Not set|仅在用户未登录时显示内容。Displays content only when the user is not logged in.| |未设置Not set|未设置Not set|设置Set|显示 集合中与用户角色之一匹配的第一个模板。Displays the first template in the collection that matches one of the user's roles. 如果未找到匹配项，则不显示任何内容。If no match is found, displays no content.| |设置Set|设置Set|未设置Not set|如果用户已登录，则显示属性中指定的模板 。If the user is logged in, displays the template specified in the property. 如果用户未登录，则显示属性中指定的模板 。If the user in not logged in, displays the template specified in the property.| |设置Set|设置Set|设置Set|如果用户已登录，则显示 集合中与用户角色之一匹配的第一个模板。If the user is logged in, displays the first template in the collection that matches one of the user's roles. 如果未找到匹配项，则显示属性中指定的模板 。If no match is found, displays the template specified in the property. 如果用户未登录，则显示属性中指定的模板 。If the user is not logged in, displays the template specified in the property.| |设置Set|未设置Not set|设置Set|如果用户已登录，则显示 集合中与用户角色之一匹配的第一个模板。If the user is logged in, displays the first template in the collection that matches one of the user's roles. 如果未找到匹配项，则显示属性中指定的模板 。If no match is found, displays the template specified in the property. 如果用户未登录，则不会显示任何内容。If the user is not logged in, nothing is displayed.| |未设置Not set|设置Set|设置Set|如果用户已登录，则显示 集合中与用户角色之一匹配的第一个模板。If the user is logged in, displays the first template in the collection that matches one of the user's roles. 如果未找到匹配项，则不会显示任何内容。If no match is found, nothing is displayed. 如果用户未登录，则显示属性中指定的模板 。If the user is not logged in, displays the template specified in the property.| 和 可用于任何设置 对象属性的属性的身份验证方案 。The and can be used with any authentication scheme that sets the property of the object's property. 你必须配置角色管理，以使用 属性基于用户在网站上的角色定义模板。You must configure role management to use the property to define templates base on the user's role on the Web site. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [了解角色管理](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/5k850zwb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Understanding Role Management](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/5k850zwb(v=vs.100)). 方法不会将网页的初始焦点设置到 控件或其任何子控件。The method does not set the initial focus of the Web page to the control, or any of its child controls. 控件中包含的控件 将在事件之后创建 。Controls contained in the control are created after the event. 若要将焦点设置到包含的子控件 ，请处理 `On_PreRender` 并调用其 方法。To set the focus to a child control contained by the , handle the `On_PreRender` and call its method. 你还可以使用 和 事件以编程方式访问控件模板中的控件 。You can also use the and events to programmatically access the controls in the control templates. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                           ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为控件支持的三种模板类型中的每种设置模板 。The following code example shows how to set templates for each of the three template types supported by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginViewClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewClass/CS/loginviewclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginViewClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewClass/VB/loginviewclassvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置向未登录到网站的用户显示的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template to display to users who are not logged in to the Web site.
The to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定当网站用户未登录到网站时向其显示的内容模板。The property specifies the content template to display to Web site users when they are not logged in to the Web site. 当属性的属性为时，将显示此模板 `null` 。This template is displayed when the property of the property is `null`. 模板绝不会向经过身份验证的用户显示。The template is never displayed to authenticated users. 如果该 属性为空，则不会向未登录的用户显示任何内容。If the property is empty, no content is displayed to users who are not logged in. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用模板中指定的模板 来显示注册个性化服务的邀请。The following code example uses the template specified in the template to display an invitation to sign up for personalized services. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginViewAnonymousTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewAnonymousTemplate/CS/loginviewanonymoustemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginViewAnonymousTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewAnonymousTemplate/VB/loginviewanonymoustemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 创建构成 控件的子控件。

span.span: Creates the child controls that make up the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建组成控件的各个控件 。The method creates the individual controls that make up the control. 根据为用户显示的内容模板，创建的控件集会有所不同。The set of controls created varies according to the content template displayed for the user. 例如，当用户没有登录到网站时，只会创建在属性中指定的模板中包含的控件 。For example, when a user is not logged in to the Web site, only the controls contained in the template specified in the property are created.

summary.span: 将数据源绑定到 及其所有子控件。

span.span: Binds a data source to and all its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将数据从源绑定到 控件及其子控件。Use the method to bind data from a source to the control and its children. 此方法解析控件中的所有数据绑定表达式 和活动模板中的任何子控件。This method resolves all data-binding expressions in the control and any child controls in the active template.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否能对 控件应用主题。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes can be applied to the control.

value.span: 如果使用主题，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use themes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为控件启用主题 。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control. 属性还会影响是否为其集合中包含的控件启用主题 。The property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its collection. 当 属性为时 `true` ，将在应用程序的主题目录中搜索要应用的控件外观。When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果主题目录中不存在特定控件的外观，则不会应用外观。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied. 当 属性为时 `false` ，不会搜索主题目录，也 不会使用属性的内容。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the property are not used. 控件可以重写 其父控件或包含页设置的值。A control can override the value set by its parent control, or the containing page. 例如，如果父控件的 设置为 `false` ，则可以通过 `true` 在各个子控件上将属性设置为，来有选择地将主题应用到父控件中包含的子控件。For example, if a parent control has set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls contained within the parent by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Login Controls Overview
ASP.NET Themes and Skins

summary.span: 获取或设置向已登录网站但不属于 属性中指定的任何角色组的网站用户显示的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template to display to Web site users who are logged in to the Web site but are not members of one of the role groups specified in the property.
The to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当同时满足以下两个条件时，将向网站用户显示属性：The property is displayed to Web site users when both of the following conditions are met: - 属性的属性 不是`null`The property of the property is not `null` - 用户不属于属性中定义的角色组 。The user does not belong to a role group defined in the property. 属性为经过身份验证的网站用户指定默认模板。The property specifies a default template for authenticated Web site users. 如果尚未配置角色管理，则 是唯一可用于经过身份验证的用户的模板。If you have not configured role management, the is the only template available for authenticated users. 有关配置角色管理的详细信息，请参阅 [了解角色管理](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/5k850zwb(v=vs.100))。For more information about configuring role management, see [Understanding Role Management](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/5k850zwb(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 模板显示已登录用户的个性化信息的链接。The following code example uses the template to display links to personalized information for logged-in users. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginViewAnonymousTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewAnonymousTemplate/CS/loginviewanonymoustemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginViewAnonymousTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewAnonymousTemplate/VB/loginviewanonymoustemplatevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnInit (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnInit (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnInit(EventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnInit : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行控件的初始化 。The method performs initialization for the control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

protected public: override void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnPreRender : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 根据登录用户的角色确定显示哪个角色组模板。

span.span: Determines which role-group template to display, based on the roles of the logged-in user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 事件中调用方法 ，以确定要向用户显示的内容模板。The method is called during the event to determine which content template to display to the user. 如果 属性的属性 为，则将 `null` 显示在属性中指定的模板 ; 否则，将显示与用户角色关联的模板。If the property of the property is `null`, the template specified in the property is displayed; otherwise, the template associated with the user's role is displayed. 如果用户不属于已定义的角色组，或未配置角色管理，则该 控件将显示在属性中指定的模板 。If the user does not belong to a defined role group, or if you have not configured role management, the control displays the template specified in the property. 有关配置角色管理的详细信息，请参阅 [角色管理提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/71ddd651-5f91-471b-ad9f-61249b0bf0d5)。For more information about configuring role management, see [Role Management Providers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/71ddd651-5f91-471b-ad9f-61249b0bf0d5). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnViewChanged (EventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnViewChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnViewChanged (e As EventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnViewChanged(EventArgs ^ e);
abstract member OnViewChanged : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnViewChanged : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 在 控件切换视图之后引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event after the control switches views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件切换视图时，它将从上一个模板中删除控件，并从新模板创建新的子控件。When the control switches views, it removes the controls from the previous template and creates new child controls from the new template. 在 创建新的子控件后调用方法。The method is called after the new child controls are created. 使用 方法可执行在新视图上初始化控件所需的任何处理，如数据绑定。Use the method to perform any processing, such as data binding, necessary to initialize the controls on the new view. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnViewChanging (EventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnViewChanging(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnViewChanging (e As EventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnViewChanging(EventArgs ^ e);
abstract member OnViewChanging : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnViewChanging : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 在 控件切换视图之前引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event before the control switches views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件切换视图时，它将从上一个模板中删除控件，并从新模板创建新的子控件。When the controls switches views, it removes the controls from the previous template and creates new child controls from the new template. 在 移除之前的控件之前调用方法。The method is called before the previous controls are removed. 在 移除控件之前，使用方法执行任何必要的处理，如保存控件信息。Use the method to perform any necessary processing, such as saving control information, before the controls are removed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

span.span: Renders the Web server control content to the client's browser using the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于使用指定的对象将服务器控件内容呈现到客户端的浏览器 。The method is used to render the server control content to the client's browser using the specified object. **注意** 此方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 控件。**Note** This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection RoleGroups { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection RoleGroups
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property RoleGroups As RoleGroupCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::RoleGroupCollection ^ RoleGroups { System::Web::UI::WebControls::RoleGroupCollection ^ get(); };
member this.RoleGroups : System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取将内容模板与特定角色相关联的角色组集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of role groups that associate content templates with particular roles.

value.span: 一个包含已定义角色组模板的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the defined role-group templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含与网站上的各种角色关联的内容模板。The property contains the content templates associated with various roles on the Web site. 将 按照在源中定义模板的顺序搜索属性中的集合。The collection in the property is searched in the order in which templates are defined in the source. 将向用户显示第一个匹配的角色组模板。The first matching role-group template is displayed to the user. 如果用户是多个角色的成员，则将使用与用户角色匹配的第一个角色组模板。If a user is a member of more than one role, the first role-group template that matches any of the user's roles is used. 如果有多个模板与单个角色关联，则仅使用第一个已定义的模板。If more than one template is associated with a single role, only the first defined template will be used. 如果登录的用户不属于角色组集合中包含的任何角色，则该站点将显示属性中指定的内容模板 。If a logged-in user does not belong to any role contained in the role-group collection, the site displays the content template specified in the property. 匿名用户永远不会显示集合中包含的任何模板 。Anonymous users are never shown any template contained in the collection. 你必须配置角色管理，以使用 属性基于网站上用户的角色来定义模板。You must configure role management to use the property to define templates based on the user's role on the Web site. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [了解角色管理](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/5k850zwb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Understanding Role Management](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/5k850zwb(v=vs.100)). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 集合。The following code example demonstrates using the collection. 由于 未设置和属性，因此仅向属于具有定义的内容模板的角色的用户显示内容。Because the and properties are not set, the content is displayed only to users who belong to roles with a defined content template. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginViewRoleGroups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewRoleGroups/CS/loginviewrolegroupscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginViewRoleGroups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewRoleGroups/VB/loginviewrolegroupsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public override string SkinID { get; set; }
.property instance string SkinID
Public Overrides Property SkinID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SkinID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SkinID : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于 控件的外观。

span.span: Gets or sets the skin to apply to the control.

value.span: 应用于 控件的外观的名称。

span.span: The name of the skin to apply to the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的可用外观包含在主题目录中的一个或多个外观文件中。Skins available to a control are contained in one or more skin files in a theme directory. 属性指定要应用于控件的外观。The property specifies which of these skins to apply to the control. 外观特定于特定控件;不能在不同类型的控件之间共享外观设置。A skin is specific to a particular control; you cannot share skin settings between controls of different types. 如果未设置 属性，控件将使用默认外观（如果已定义）。If you do not set the property, a control uses the default skin if one is defined. 例如，如果为控件定义了没有 ID 的外观 ，则该外观适用于 未按 ID 显式引用外观且未设置为禁用主题的所有控件。For example, if a skin without an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies to all controls that do not explicitly reference a skin by ID and that are not set to disable theming. 如果为控件定义了具有 ID 的外观 ，则该外观仅适用于 设置为该 id 的控件。If a skin with an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies only to controls whose is set to that ID. 如果主题目录中的外观文件不包含具有指定的外观 ，则 在运行时将引发异常。If the skin files in a theme directory do not contain a skin with the specified , an exception is thrown at run time.

exception.span: 主题中不存在 属性中指定的外观。

span.span: The skin specified in the property does not exist in the theme.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview
ASP.NET Themes and Skins

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler ViewChanged;
.event class System.EventHandler ViewChanged
Public Custom Event ViewChanged As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ ViewChanged;
member this.ViewChanged : EventHandler

summary.span: 在视图更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the view is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件切换视图时，它将从上一个模板中删除控件，并从新模板创建新的子控件。When the control switches views, it removes the controls from the previous template and creates new child controls from the new template. 创建新的子控件后引发事件。The event is raised after the new child controls are created. 使用 事件可执行在新视图上初始化控件所需的任何处理，如数据绑定。Use the event to perform any processing, such as data binding, necessary to initialize the controls on the new view. > [!NOTE] > 仅当用户的登录状态在回发到页面时才会引发事件。The event is only raised if the login status for a user changes during a postback to the page. 如果用户使用 控件登录，或如果用户使用控件注销，则不会引发事件 。The event will not be raised if a user logs in using the control, or if the user logs out using the control. 如果用户登录或注销后接重定向，也不会发生该事件。The event will also not occur if a user is logged in or out followed by a redirect. 事件发生的一个示例 是当用户通过调用 方法注销而不被重定向到另一个页面时。An example of when the event will occur is when a user is logged out by calling the method without being redirected to another page. 在下一次回发到页面时， 控件将检测用户的登录状态更改，然后引发 事件。During the next postback to the page, the control will detect the change in the login status for the user, and then raise the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

span.span: ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler ViewChanging;
.event class System.EventHandler ViewChanging

public: event EventHandler ^ ViewChanging;
member this.ViewChanging : EventHandler

summary.span: 在视图更改前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the view is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件切换视图时，它将从上一个模板中删除控件，并从新模板创建新的子控件。When the control switches views, it removes the controls from the previous template and creates new child controls from the new template. 在 移除之前的控件之前引发该事件。The event is raised before the previous controls are removed. 使用 事件执行任何处理，如在删除控件之前需要保存控件信息。Use the event to perform any processing, such as saving control information, necessary before the controls are removed. > [!NOTE] > 仅当用户的登录状态在回发到页面时才会引发事件。The event is only raised if the login status for a user changes during a postback to the page. 如果用户使用 控件登录，或如果用户使用控件注销，则不会引发事件 。The event will not be raised if a user logs in using the control, or if the user logs out using the control. 如果用户登录或注销后接重定向，也不会发生该事件。The event will also not occur if a user is logged in or out followed by a redirect. 事件发生的一个示例 是当用户通过调用 方法注销而不被重定向到另一个页面时。An example of when the event will occur is when a user is logged out by calling the method without being redirected to another page. 在下一次回发到页面时， 控件将检测用户的登录状态更改，然后引发 事件。During the next postback to the page, the control will detect the change in the login status for the user, and then raise the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

span.span: ASP.NET Login Controls Overview
